url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Artifacts and Other Items/Artifacts/Minor Artifacts/Deck of Many Things/Skull

sections.body: A dread wraith appears. The character must fight it alone—if others help, dread wraiths appear to fight them as well. If the character is slain, she is slain forever and cannot be revived, even with a wish or a miracle.

name: Skull
